subject: Golf
PGA Championship
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: A year and a half after dislocating his shoulder, Paul Casey has begun a climb back up the world rankings and shot a first-round 67 at the P.G.A. Championship.
snippet: A year and a half after dislocating his shoulder, Paul Casey has begun a climb back up the world rankings and shot a first-round 67 at the P.G.A. Championship.
